fields.name: Astronomy
fields.description: Astronomy is a branch of magic that studies stars and the movement of planets. It is a subject where the use of practical magic during lessons isn't necessary.

fields.name: Charms
fields.description: The spells learned in Charms class are taken from textbooks. Students are taught specific wand movements and proper pronunciation.

fields.name: Dark Arts
fields.description: Unforgivable Curses and numerous other forms of Dark magic are taught in this class.

fields.name: Defence Against the Dark Arts
fields.description: In this class students learn how to magically defend themselves against Dark Creatures, the Dark Arts, and other dark charms.

fields.name: Flying
fields.description: The subject teaches students how to fly broomsticks.

fields.name: Herbology
fields.description: Herbology is the study of magical and mundane plants and fungi, making it the wizarding equivalent to botany.

fields.name: History of Magic
fields.description: This class is a study of magical history. This is one of the subjects where the use of magic practically isn't necessary.

fields.name: Muggle Studies
fields.description: Muggle Studies is an elective class and part of the non-magical studies curriculum. It is exactly what the name implies â€” the study of the daily lives of Muggles and how they cope with electricity, technology and science, and not magic.

fields.name: Potions
fields.description: In this class, students learn the correct way to brew potions.

fields.name: Transfiguration
fields.description: This class teaches the art of changing the form and appearance of an object.

fields.name: Alchemy
fields.description: This class concerns the ancient science of Alchemy, the study of the four basic elements, as well as the study of the transmutation of substances.

fields.name: Apparition
fields.description: Apparition is an optional twelve-week course offered for, as its name suggests, learning how to Apparate.

fields.name: Divination
fields.description: This class teaches methods of divining the future, or gathering insights into future events, through various rituals and tools.

fields.name: Study of Ancient Runes
fields.description: Ancient Runes is a mostly theoretical subject that studies the ancient runic scripts of magic.
